name: VaxDose
title: Dose of a Vaccine
description: Detailed information about each vaccination dose.

element.short: Dose of a Vaccine
element.definition: Detailed information about each vaccination dose.

element.short: Unique identifier for the dose.
element.definition: Unique identifier for the dose.

element.short: Volume of the vaccine administered.
element.definition: Volume of the vaccine administered.

element.short: Date the vaccine was administered.
element.definition: Date the vaccine was administered.

element.short: CVX code for the vaccine administered.

element.short: Manufacturer's vaccine code.
element.definition: Manufacturer's vaccine code.

element.short: List of antigens in the vaccine.

element.short: Date of birth of the recipient.

element.short: Target disease for the vaccine.

element.short: Index of the dose in the vaccination series.

element.short: If the vaccine was administered inadvertently.

element.short: A reason related to the valid age for vaccine administration.

element.short: If there was a preferred interval followed.

element.short: If the interval was allowed despite being non-standard.
